Html:
Hello,

Mongoose is not (yet) modelized in Rawr, so I'm asking myself how it is currently ranked for Feral Bear and Cat ? Is there any WotLK weapon enchant that is strictly better than it atm ?

Thanks

Rawr.Cat and Rawr.Bear will support Mongoose, and Rawr.Cat will support Berserking, in Rawr 2.2.

In the mean time... Generally, for Cat: Massacre < Mongoose < Berserking    (However, note that Berserking is typically 3000 to 5000g, so probably not worth it until you pick up a Journey's End, and primarily raid as a cat)
Generally, for Bear: 35agi < Mongoose

If you really want to try it in 2.1.4 you can hand edit the EnchantCache.xml file. Add the following lines at the bottom (just before the closing </ArrayofEnchant>):

  <Enchant>
    <Id>9991</Id>
    <Name>Mongoose - Bear</Name>
    <Slot>OneHand</Slot>
    <Stats>
      <Agility>55</Agility>
      <PhysicalHaste>0.01</PhysicalHaste>
    </Stats>
  </Enchant>
  <Enchant>
    <Id>9992</Id>
    <Name>Mongoose - Cat</Name>
    <Slot>OneHand</Slot>
    <Stats>
      <Agility>40</Agility>
      <PhysicalHaste>0.01</PhysicalHaste>
    </Stats>
  </Enchant>

It isn't perfect but it is close. Thanks Astrylian for this hack!
